product_name: Sea to Summit Big River Dry Bag - 5 Liters
long_description: Whether backpacking, trekking, boating or pack-rafting, you need to keep your gear dry and functioning. The Sea to Summit Big River 5-liter dry bag was created with you in mind.
short_description: Whether backpacking, trekking, boating or pack-rafting, you need to keep your gear dry and functioning. The Sea to Summit Big River 5-liter dry bag was created with you in mind.
